string.value: A new region has been discovered recently. If you wish to find out about the city of alchemy, talk to Cassandra, who claims to know everything about Maple World.
Cassandra says she can use her magic to send you over to Magatia. If you are determined to go to Magatia, talk to #bCassandra#k.
You have arrived in Magatia, the city of alchemy.
This is amazing news! A new town has been discovered in Maple World! It's the town of Alchemy that has been hidden for so long! Don't you want to find out more about the town of Alchemy?
#bMagatia#k, the town of Alchemy, was discovered in the Nihal Desert in Ossyria. The town is located next to Ariant. If you'd like, I will use my magic to send you there.
Talk to me again if you want to go to Magatia. Until then, I will be gathering my magical powers.
Aren't you curious about Magatia, the town of Alchemy?
